channel.title: Come on please help I rly need help!
channel.description: I still need help, someone is [b][i][u]STILL[/u][/i][/b] trying to null my server. Some null's get dced but how do I make it so the flooding and shutting down will stop. So please, help.

item.title: Come on please help I rly need help!
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

O_o if that were a player
edit: oh, duh, nvm but now he stopped, for what ever reason and it keeps saying [KERNEL]: Machine too slow to run this server! when it’s not and it has never said that.

Read full topic
item.source: Come on please help I rly need help!

item.title: Come on please help I rly need help!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

umm if you wanna block that connection (72-135-62-254) then make a filter for it

if(!connectedFrom.startsWith(“72-135-62-254”)){
p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, “ipbans”);
p.writeLog(p.playerName, “ipbans”);
p.disconnected = true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Come on please help I rly need help!

item.title: Come on please help I rly need help!
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

[quote=“alpha 0nx, post:4, topic:342011”]you are going to need to add an anti-null system.
You can probably find one somewhere on the forums, or you can request one, or you can code your own.[/quote]

I do but it’s old and defective, I don’t know where it even is in my client.java any more

Read full topic
item.source: Come on please help I rly need help!

item.title: Come on please help I rly need help!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

a person is doing something? I don’t really know what nulling is.
Pretty much, if it’s a person than you can make a filter for them

if (playerName.startsWith(“Null”)){
writeLog(playerLastConnect, “ipbans”);
disconnected = true;
}

Read full topic
